attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
bigTextEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the current sats per fiat unit should be displayed in large mode in the middle instead of at bottom of image
bigTextOnTopEnabled.comment: If bigTextEnabled is true, this controls whether the amount of sats per fiat unit are rendered below visual graph or above it in z-order
fiatUnit.comment: The three letter fiat currency unit for value comparisons
headerColor.comment: The color of the header text expressed as a Hexadecial color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
priceShadowColor.comment: The color of the text shadow for the current sats per dollar expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceDownColor.comment: The color of the text for the current sats per fiat unit expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceUpColor.comment: The color of the text for the current sats per fiat unit expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceUrl.comment: The url that provides the pricing information from bisq marketplace
satShape.comment: The shape that each individual sat should be drawn.

satShape.choices.circle: Renders each sat as a circle
satShape.choices.square: Renders each sat as a square (default)
satShape.choices.symbol-s: Renders as a circle outlining an S
satShape.choices.triangle: Renders each sat as a triangle

satShapeColor.comment: The color to render each sat expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
